price: 18. En ce jour, vous comparaîtrez (devant Allah) et rien de vous ne sera tenu caché.
arabic: يَوۡمَئِذٖ تُعۡرَضُونَ لَا تَخۡفَىٰ مِنكُمۡ خَافِيَةٞ

version.title: French Translation - Noor International Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into French, by Dr. Nabil Radwan, published by Noor International Center - was printed in 2017.

meta.transliteration: yawma-idhin tuʿ'raḍūna lā takhfā minkum khāfiyatun
